_header: It was a knight beyond the sea / That rich man was wont to be
_description: The Virgin Mary comes to the Devil instead of his Victim, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
HIt was a kniht bi ȝonde þe seeÞat riche mon was
                    wont to be…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…AMEN I rede alle we syngeffor of þat blisse is non
                    endynge
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
De milite depauperato dilgente matrem domine (f.
                    169rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Die Evangelien-Geschichten der Homiliensammlung des Ms. Vernon.”

BodAsh42.First Lines:
It was a kniȝt beȝonde þe seþat riche man was
                    wont to be…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Amen amen i rede we syngeffor of þat ioye es nane
                    endinge

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
Þer was a knyht be ȝond þe seÞat a riche man
                    was wonid to be…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede alle we syngefor of þat blisse is non
                    endynge
CULAdd8335.Note: Division between this and preceding 3391 occurs 2 lines earlier in this MS.

BLHar2391.First Lines: It was a knyght be ȝond þe seþat rych man was wont to be…
BLHar2391.Last Lines: …Amen amen I red we syngffor of þat Ioy es none endyng

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
It was a knyght be yonde þe seThat riche man was wonte to
                    be…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we all syngeffor of that blyse bes na
                    endynge

BLHar4196.First Lines: IN ingland whilom wund a knightþat sum tyme was of mekil might…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …and ledis to life þat lastes ayoure lady vs wis to wend þat way

Hyt was knytht by ȝond þe seþat ryche man wos wont
                    to be…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we all syngeffor þayr is blys with oute
                    endynge
